System access¶

Windows Client¶

Click the symbol Launchpad in the toolbar. The Launchpad is opened in a new tab.

Starting the Launchpad from the toolbar

Web browser¶

Click the Launchpad symbol in the header. The Launchpad is opened in the same tab.

Starting the Launchpad in the web browser
